alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:01PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cochise County through 430 PM MST... At 401 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tombstone moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tombstone. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 309 and 322. Route 82 between mile markers 64 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
